column4: Working on a terrible old ubuntu computer ( I believe ). How can I confirm and then upgrade the system?
Lot of newbs in here today. :-)
You are entitled to your opinion. :-)
I'd hope so. The internets that I come from are kinda free in that regard.
haven't you hears? China has their own, Iran is starting their own... so yes! :P
Fair enough. Guess it depends on your definition. lol
Are you always this combative? lol
heh, sorry to come across that way. I'm just stongly opinionated & got too much sleep last night :)
No worries. I always get hate for the newb comments. lol
newb comments make me feel welcome - especially when they come AFTER help :P
We were all newbs at one time.
Consider yourself lucky, when I started I had a dial-up connection.
yeah, I guess the only guy that was never a Linux n00b is Linus Torvalds...
Of course he was. When he started writing it. :-)
